info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Steuben, southeastern Elkhart, Noble, northern Whitley, northwestern De Kalb, northeastern Kosciusko and Lagrange Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sturgis to near North Webster. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Kendallville, Angola, Ligonier, Syracuse, Lagrange, Avilla, Albion, Fremont, Rome City, Topeka, North Webster, Millersburg, Ray, Swan, Scott, Etna, Wolcottville, Ashley and Shipshewana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 339 and 357. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 110 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Indiana...and southwestern Michigan. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana.
